    FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

     
    Where is the city office located?

    City office is located near Jamuna
    Jore Pul, opp. SBI, Kunda.

    Ph.no.- 9199345112
    Id- xavierdeoghar@gmail.com

    Whom to contact for admission?

    Contact the PRO at 9199345112 or 8407801054

    Whom to contact for general queries?

    For general queries contact 9199345112, 9199345172,
    8407801054 or 8407801061.

    How to pay fees online?

    Online fees can be paid by logging in
    to the student’s portal through
    our website www.stxaviersdeoghar.com

    Whom to contact for faculty recruitment?

    Applications can be sent directly to our city office or mailed to our id stxaviersdeoghar@gmail.com. Online application can also be filled in through our website www.stxaviersdeoghar.com
